name: Czech Fintech Association
goal:
- Represent fintech companies vis-a-vis legislators
- Facilitate innovation in financial sector
- facilitate legal certainty for financial technologies companies
interests: Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Institutional affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Fintech Action Plan
European Blockchain Partnership
Capital Markets Union
Digital Europe (2021-)
